member.summary: If the FromSql require parameters to pass to SQL execute when returning the objects.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu
member.summary: Represents a node from XML Application Model.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.Id
member.summary: The Id attribute from XML. The ID of the menu item.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.DisplayName
member.summary: The DisplayName attribute from XML. The display name of the menu item, if null and of type DetailView or ListView will use the title from the view.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.Icon
member.summary: The Icon attribute from XML. The icon of the menu item, if null and of type DetailView or ListView will use the icon from the view.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.IntIndex
member.summary: The Index attribute from XML. The index order of the menu item.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.Type
member.summary: The Type attribute from XML. The type defines what the action the menu should execute when accessed.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.ViewID
member.summary: The ViewID attribute from XML. The ViewID of the view the menu should show, when the type is DetailView or ListView.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.ReportPath
member.summary: The ReportPath attribute from XML. The path of the report the menu should open, only used with Report type.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.URL
member.summary: The URL attribute from XML. The URL the menu should open, only used with External type.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.BoolShowBadge
member.summary: The ShowBadge attribute from XML. Indicates if the menu should display the badge along with the name, only used with sub menus or ListViews, indicating the number of records (count) are available.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.SubMenus
member.summary: The sub menus included in this menu. If the menu has sub menus the menu Type is ignored.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.Index
member.summary: The Index attribute from XML. The index order of the menu item.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.ShowBadge
member.summary: The ShowBadge attribute from XML. Indicates if the menu should display the badge along with the name, only used with sub menus or ListViews, indicating the number of records (count) are available.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Module.Navigation.Menu.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the Index with other menu object, to sort the menus array.
member.param: The menu object to compare to.
member.returns: A signed number indicating the relative values of this instance and value. Return Value Description Less than zero: This instance is less than value. Zero: This instance is equal to value. Greater than zero: This instance is greater than value.

member.summary: Merges two arrays of objects that implements the interface IMergeable.

member.param: The source array, containing the original items values.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Module.Serialization.BaseNode.MergeElements``1(Zambon.Core.Module.Serialization.ChildItemCollection{``0},Zambon.Core.Module.Serialization.ChildItemCollection{``0})
member.summary: Merges two arrays of objects that implements the interface IMergeable.
member.typeparam: The element type of the array.
member.param: The target array, that will have the items with null values set.
The source array, containing the original items values.
member.returns: Returns the target array plus all any new element from the source array.

member.summary: Collection of child items. This collection automatically set the Parent property of the child items when they are added or removed
